title: For Sale N321 SF HESS Carroll
author: rhodeskenm

posts.post_title: For Sale N321 SF HESS Carroll
posts.post_content:
SGC A Carroll, C, Pioneers

$970 OBO

Really sharp and clean Authentic - great looking card for California League Collectors

Will send Pics

Contact [url]rhodeskenm@gmail.com[/url]

Is there any possible way to post a pic of this card here. I am interested but my email is down currently for some reason.

Thanks,

Craig

[quote name="Craig Max" post=2188258]Is there any possible way to post a pic of this card here.[/QUOTE]

If the OP emails me [url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url] the pics I can post them here.

Wow - this is pretty nice.  Thank you for the pictures (below).  Very tempted.  I'm sure somebody smarter than me will be on this quickly.  Just curious, does it look skinned?  



[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=498860&d=1642885337[/IMG]
Looks like some glue/paste residue could be the reason for the Auth designation.  Looks nice probably sat in an album for years.
I'll take it if Craig doesn't.
I guess I'll be the third alternate if it's only glue residue.  It's really one of the cleanest N321's I've seen.
Fred - It isn't glue residue it is paper loss from being in an album.
